I am an Agent for a certain person whose name,|for some reason, I cannot reveal. Yes. I'm|talking about someone who claims to be a Fan|
|Fan of yours.

19.「それでは また後ほど。| くれぐれも よろしくお願いしますよ。: I will see you later. Thank you very much for|your cooperation.

20.「おお ありがとうございます！| ……と言いたいところですが どうやら| 他に依: Oh, thank you! I'd like to say thank you, but|apparently I have a lot of other requests.

21.「さすがは 我が主の見込んだ方。| 引く手あまたということですな。: As one would expect from our Lord. I can't|wait to see what you can come up with.

|believing that.

37.「どうも こいつら 正気じゃねーみてえだ。| 今は 下手に刺激しないほうが いい: Thanks. These guys look like they're out of|their minds. We shouldn't provoke them now!
